mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_exhibition_collection ( boot_id, customer_id, company_nature, product_category, other_category, booth_selection, is_pay, old_price, collection_price, remark, create_date, operate_date ) VALUES ( #{bootId}, #{customerId}, #{companyNature}, #{productCategory}, #{otherCategory}, #{boothSelection}, '0', #{oldPrice}, #{oldPrice}, #{remark}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t3.exhibition_title, t2.booth_code, t2.booth_size, t3.exhibition_address, t3.exhibition_start_time, t3.exhibition_end_time, t3.cover_image FROM t_exhibition_collection t1 LEFT JOIN t_exhibition_booth t2 ON t1.boot_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_exhibition t3 ON t2.exhibition_id = t3.id WHERE t1.customer_id = #{customerId}

SELECT t1.id, t3.exhibition_title, t2.booth_code, t2.booth_size, t1.old_price, t1.collection_price, t3.exhibition_address, t3.exhibition_start_time, t3.exhibition_end_time, t3.customer_telephone1, t3.customer_telephone2, t1.remark, t2.booth_status, t1.company_nature, t1.product_category, t1.other_category, t1.booth_selection FROM t_exhibition_collection t1 LEFT JOIN t_exhibition_booth t2 ON t1.boot_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN t_exhibition t3 ON t2.exhibition_id = t3.id WHERE t1.id = #{collId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_exhibition_collection SET is_pay = '1' WHERE boot_id = #{boothId} AND #{customerId}
